name: TAR_SVC_LN_INFO
description: The service line adjudication information for a specific case of a Treatment Authorization Request (TAR). The associated administrative information for the case can be found in the TAR_INFO table with the same referral and coverage ID.

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: The referral ID for the referral record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: TAR_SERVICE_CODE
columns.description: The service code for the line of Treatment Authorization Request (TAR) adjudication info.

columns.name: TAR_MODIFIER
columns.description: The modifier for the line of Treatment Authorization Request (TAR) adjudication info.

columns.name: TAR_VALID_FROM_DATE
columns.description: The start date for the line of Treatment Authorization Request (TAR) adjudication info.

columns.name: TAR_VALID_TO_DATE
columns.description: The expiration date for the line of Treatment Authorization Request (TAR) adjudication info.

columns.name: TAR_UNITS
columns.description: The number of units for the line of Treatment Authorization Request (TAR) adjudication info.

columns.name: TAR_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The status for the line of Treatment Authorization Request (TAR) adjudication info.

columns.name: TAR_DESC
columns.description: The free text description for the line of Treatment Authorization Request (TAR) adjudication info.

columns.name: TAR_RSN
columns.description: The free text reason for the line of Treatment Authorization Request (TAR) adjudication info.

columns.name: TAR_SVC_LN_CVG_ID
columns.description: The coverage associated with the line of Treatment Authorization Request (TAR) adjudication information.

columns.name: TAR_SVC_LN_CTL_NUM
columns.description: The service line Treatment Authorization Request (TAR) control number. If this value exists, it should be used as a control number for this service line. If there is no value, the header level control number (TAR_CTL_NUM in table TAR_INFO) should be used.
